thread.title_full: This luxury fragrance gift set is the ultimate Valentine's Day gift and saves you more than £300

title: This luxury fragrance gift set is the ultimate Valentine's Day gift and saves you more than £300
text:
The Sentier fragrance gift set is the perfect Valentine's Day gift for your loved one or even for Mother's Day, and gets you £420 worth of perfume and candles for £119 Looking for the perfect Valentine's Day present or planning ahead for Mother's Day? The luxurious Winds of Luck Gift Set from Sentier is a fabulous choice that'll definitely impress your special someone. Combining both perfumes and scented candles, it's the dreamy fragrance gift set that's also kind on your wallet, saving you a whopping £300.
This set is valued at £420 and even includes a £25 gift card for them to treat themselves to something extra at the Sentier store. But the best bit is, you can nab the Winds of Luck Gift Set for £119, giving you massive savings.
READ MORE: Jo Malone releases new limited edition rose-scented perfume in time for Valentine's Day
READ MORE: Ekin-Su's 'rich and feminine' perfume was the perfect pick for her dramatic Love Island arrival
Unwrap the elegant Winds of Luck Gift Set and discover eight tantalising 10ml perfumes in some of Sentier's top-selling aromas, coupled with four sumptuous 60mg scented candles. These fragrances are perfectly curated for the season, mixing floral notes with winter fragrances.
Each essence in the collection is crafted to "awaken your confidence and inspire bold exploration of your true potential." The scented products all come in a…
